name: Wayfarers Edge
storyline:
In Wayfarers Edge, you will take the role of a citizen from one of three nations venturing out of the “Known World” in search of lands beyond. By traveling through The Ouroboros, a previously impassable mountain range that surrounded the Known World, you and other brave, desperate, and determined souls will risk your very lives and futures in hopes of what lies beyond the dangerous mountain range.

With unique rpg combat, base building/management, and social bond systems, struggle against the elements, dangers, and fate itself as you make your way into places no other human on Tyr has ever been!
summary: Venture into a perilous and once impassable mountain range in Wayfarers Edge! An RPG focused on traversing unknown frontier lands in a fantasy/western setting to take hold of your future. Travel together with other brave settlers and build bonds to help overcome the dangers together!
